overview: Kirlian Camera is an Italian group mainly playing Electro Wave, dark wave music.During 2000 the lineup is stabilized when talented singer/composer/writer Elena Alice Fossi joins Kirlian Camera. She is also the leader of side-projects Alice Neve Fox, Spectra*paris and Siderartica, and co-leader in the Stalingrad project (nowadays renamed as Stalingrad Valkyrie) with Bergamini himself.
title: Kirlian Camera - Live - Theaterfabrik Leipzig 2014
